title: The Truth About Tequila: Believe in Me
description: Their life will never be perfect. Max and Gina know this all too well.Too much danger. Too many enemies. Too few people they can truly trust.A fate they both accept because at least it will be their life. Together. They’ve survived the threats against them and protected the people they love. Now it’s their turn to enjoy the happiness they fought so hard to find.Until unexpected vengeance sucks Max deeper into the world he and Gina thought they finally had the chance to escape. Prisoners to revenge that crumbles their dreams faster than they ever imagined. Now they rule the world they despise. Can their relationship withstand choosing honor over love?
author: Nikki Belaire
